description: A description of the history of transfers of ownership and custody of artwork, using the CMOA Provenance Standard.
title: CMOA Provenance Standard Record

___sellers_agent.description: A party who assisted the party who was relinquishing the object.
___sellers_agent.title: Seller's Agent

___direct_transfer.description: Did the transaction directly pass to the acquiring party from the previous period?
___direct_transfer.title: Direct Tranfer?

items.description: A bibliographical reference to a primary source that documents the transaction
items.title: Citation

___stock_number.description: A identification number given to the object as part of the transaction
___stock_number.title: Stock or Lot Number

___currency_symbol.description: The symbol used to indicate the currency the transaction was denominated in
___currency_symbol.title: Currency Unit

___value.description: The numeric value of the transaction
___value.title: Purchase Value

___string.description: The abount of the purchase price as text
___string.title: Currency Text

___footnote.description: An free text field with additional information about the transaction
___footnote.title: Footnote

___acquisition_method.description: A URI referencing a method from a controlled vocabulary describing the way in which the work changed hands.
___acquisition_method.title: Acquisition Method

___text.description: The original, unparsed textual representation of this period
___text.title: Provenance Text

___purchasing_agent.description: A party who assisted the party who was acquiring the object.
___purchasing_agent.title: Purchasing Agent

___timespan.description: The dates when the transfer event took place, and optionally the dates when the acquiring party relinquished the object.
___timespan.title: Transfer Dates

___eotb.description: The latest possible moment when the acquisition event could have taken place.
___eotb.title: End of the Begin

___in.description: Used for single-day events, when the BOTB and EOTE are the same date.
___in.title: On this Date

___bote.description: The earliest possible moment when the relinquishing event could have taken place.
___bote.title: Begin of the End

___begin.description: The date the acquisition event took place—used when the BOTB and EOTB are the same date.
___begin.title: Begin Date

___eote.description: The latest possible moment when the relinquishing event could have taken place.
___eote.title: End of the End

___botb.description: The earliest possible moment the acquisition event could have taken place.
___botb.title: Begin of the Begin

___end.description: The date the relinquishing event took place—used when the EOTB and EOTE are the same date.
___end.title: End Date

___event.description: An explicit reference to the event in which this work changed hands
___event.title: Named Event

___transfer_location.description: The explicit place where the transfer event took place.
___transfer_location.title: Location of Transfer

___period_certainty.description: Are you certain that this period is correct in its entirety?
___period_certainty.title: Period Certainty

___uri.description: an explicit link to a URI in an authority file for this name
___uri.title: Linked Data URI

___string.description: The textual representation of this name
___string.title: Name Value

___uri.description: an explicit link to a URI in an authority file for this name
___uri.title: Linked Data URI

___string.description: The textual representation of this name
___string.title: Name Value

___birth.description: The first year the party was in existance
___birth.title: Birth or Founding Year

___relationship.description: A party related to the named party.  (Note that the relationship type describes the relationship from the point of view of the this party.  So 'son' means that this party was the father of the named party.
___relationship.title: Familial Relationship

___uri.description: an explicit link to a URI in an authority file for this name
___uri.title: Linked Data URI

___string.description: The textual representation of this name
___string.title: Name Value

___death.description: The last year the party was in existance
___death.title: Death or Dissolusion Year
